ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.v21.segment

Class NK1

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.AbstractStructure
      • ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.AbstractSegment
        • ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.v21.segment.NK1
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Segment, Structure, Visitable, Serializable

    public class NK1
extends AbstractSegment

    Represents an HL7 NK1 message segment (NEXT OF KIN). This segment has the following fields:

    • NK1-1: SET ID - NEXT OF KIN (SI)
    • NK1-2: NEXT OF KIN NAME (PN) optional
    • NK1-3: NEXT OF KIN RELATIONSHIP (ST) optional
    • NK1-4: NEXT OF KIN - ADDRESS (AD) optional
    • NK1-5: NEXT OF KIN - PHONE NUMBER (TN) optional repeating
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public int getNEXTOFKINPHONENUMBERReps()
        Returns a count of the current number of repetitions of NEXT OF KIN - PHONE NUMBER (NK1-5). This method does not create a repetition, so if no repetitions have currently been defined or accessed, it will return zero.
